The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測及實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 1.物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2.視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL語言的使用與資料庫連結 4.智慧型演算法 5.工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於按照熱力學和原子機構的基本理論來解釋一些新發展，並以此來討論相變化的問題。內容有相變化之熱力學和擴散學理論，液相－固相及固相－固相相變化之討論。
description.en: The objective of this course to present a treatment of phase transformations in which these and other new developments could be explained in terms of the basic principles of thermodynamics and atomic mechanisms。The contents introduce thermodynamics and diffusion theories of phase transformations，and deal with liquid－solid phase transformations，solid－solid phase transformations。

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.zh: 有鑒於國內的教育制度主張男女擁有平等的權利，但實際結果卻是女學生在理工科系方面成為少數族群，本課程以增進女性參與人機互動為主要目標，結合一連串的研習營教學與展示技術的引入，教導有關互動科技技術等相關應用，並透過了解性別研究的主要流派與其理論，來確認性別研究與互動設計的性質與功能，期待學生能再了解性別研究的主要理論後，能把它應用於互動設計以及創意發想上，以因應未來女性經濟力的快速掘起。
description.en: The education system of Taiwan claims that men and women are equal. The truth is that female students are only a minority of the department of the science and engineering, not to mention the percentage of the further education in this field. Based on this concept, we plan the interactive curriculum. We will go to give instruction about the interactive technology. In order to test the spot reaction and track the reaction after the exhibition when the exhibition is ongoing, we will apply Radio-frequency identification. The outdoor education and the indoor education; the two complement each other and expecting this exhibition to encourage more female students to discovery the science and have better achievements in this field.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討效率市場假說下的異常現象，本課程以文獻討論為主，並且用心理學的理論來加以解釋投資人在金融市場的行為模式。
description.en: The empirical and theoretical evidence of the efficient market hypothesis (EMH) has been challenged in the past two decades. Behavioural finance has developed as an approach to try to explain financial market anomalies from the EMH. The aim of this course is to discuss the related financial literature and apply the psychological theory of individual behaviour to the financial markets. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Course Descriptions: Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their  entrepreneurial approaches to innovation.Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 車輛產業是一個不允許失效發生的產業，為了防止系統失效的發生，必須有一套嚴謹且可靠的開發流程來讓開發工程師依循。如何提供一套功能安全設計流程來讓開發工程師依循，且對於分析結果有嚴謹的確認制度是相關產業未來生存與發展之非常重要的工作，因此車輛安全技術國際標準(ISO 26262) 將成為車輛產業系統功能安全設計分析手法的主流。
description.en: The occurrence of system failure is not allowed in vehicle industry. In order to prevent it, developers must have rigorous and reliable development processes. How to provide a set of functional safety design processes to help developers to follow and a strict accreditation criterion to ensure that analysis results are consistent with requirements are very important for the related industries to survive and develop.  Consequently, ISO 26262, the international standard of road vehicles functional safety will become the main analysis techniques of a system function safety design for vehicle industry in future.

notes: 車輛所與車輛所在職專班合開

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

notes: 日夜合開, 共同科館411

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 口語言談或書寫篇章的整段言詞構成一個意義單位，表達某種溝通意義及意圖。用詞遣字最需要的是語言運用的條理性，包括上下文高度一致以及邏輯緊密連貫。此課程將利用道地英文文章為基礎來分析英文篇章詞句中的語意架構。這種實際操作的目標在於幫助學生發展英文寫作技巧，同時也訓練思考能力。此課程可能包括以下議題： 	英語/文的合理表達方式及結構 	母語的語言/概念基模對於外語言詞表達的影響 	字彙/言詞適當性與意識型態的關係 	英文中習慣與創新的言詞模式及字彙選擇 	構成英語文溝通模式的價值與信念系統 	外語社會文化語意貼切所需之認知精確度與概念流利度
description.en: Discourse as a stretch of spoken or written language constitutes a semantic unit to convey certain communicative meanings and intentions. It demands an orderly use of language in terms of a high level of lexical cohesion as well as logical coherence. This course will employ real-world English writing as a springboard to the analysis and understanding of semantic scaffolding of a discourse. Such a practice aims to help students develop skills in English writing along with those in critical thinking. Topics to be addressed may include the following: 	The sense-making expressions and structures in English;  	The impacts of L1 linguistic/conceptual schemas on the L2 discourse; 	The lexical/discursive appropriateness in relation to ideological complexes; 	The conventional and creative discursive patterns and lexical choices in English; 	The system of values and beliefs that constitutes the English-language communication mode;  	The cognitive sophistication and conceptual fluency

name.zh: 專業英文課程設計與評量
name.en: English curriculum design and evaluation in professional fie

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生職場英語課程設計及評量的理論基礎，並懂得應用理論基礎到實際的職場英語文課程發展。本課程主要探討主題為課程設計的概念、模式及其程序，及應用課程設計的理論於職場英語文課程的發展及評量。
description.en: This course aims at exploring knowledge bases of the English curriculum design and evaluation and putting curricular theories into practice in curriculum planning for professional development English courses. Emphases of the course will be on major issues, theoretical bases and procedures of the English curriculum planning, especially the English course design for professional fields and evaluation of the effectiveness of the designed courses.

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

name.en: Special Integration Topics on Technology in Cultural and Creative Industry

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何整合科技於文化創意產業，透過案例教學，幫助學生結合有效率的資訊科技工具於人文藝術，以發展文化創意產業，並創造高附加價值的效益。當今產、官、學、研都強調跨域整合的重要性，文創與互動科技的結合，能為文化創意作加值，並注入新生命、新體驗，因此，文創遇到科技後，所激盪出的火花與創意，已逐漸受到產、學界的青睞。本課程將探討文化創意的發展脈絡、文創的底蘊與其應用面、互動科技的應用，透過文獻研讀、案例分析等方式，瞭解國外最新研究與趨勢，討論文創與科技的創新應用可行性，引領文化創意產業轉型，規劃未來文創與科技整合的新契機。
description.en: The course intends to explore about how to integrate the technology into the cultural and creative Industries. Through case study, it will help students to combine efficient information technology tools in the field of arts and humanities, and also facilitate the development of cultural and creative industries, and create high value-added benefits for these industries. Today's industry, government, academia, research has emphasized the importance of cross-discipline consolidation. It means that cultural creation and interactive technology combined with value-added as a bonus for the cultural creation, and implant new life, new experiences. Therefore, when the cultural creation encounter technology, which bring out the spark and creativity, has gradually been favored both with industry  and academia. This course will explore the cultural creative context, cultural inside information and its application, the interactive technology application by using the method of literature review, cas

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：審計及會計專業、AICPA Top10 Technologies、AIS research methods、IT technologies、查核規劃、Risk analysis、Security management、內部控制結構等。本課程將介紹的主題如下： ◆會計資訊系統之重要性和意義 ◆會計資訊系統與內外環境的關係 ◆資料處理作業程序中的五大功能 ◆內部控制與會計資系統 ◆資訊系統的工具與技術 ◆系統開發 ◆資料庫管理 ◆會計實務軟體的介紹與操作 ◆介紹有關AIS研究之分類及內容。 ◆新興的AIS研究課題及資訊應用。
description.en: Accounting information systems courses will provide the discussion on the areas of auditing and accounting profession, AICPA Top10 Technologies, AIS research methods, IT technologies, Risk analysis, Security management and Internal control, etc. In completing this course, the student's objectives will be ... 1. To develop an awareness of recent developments in accounting information systems technology. 2. To become familiar with, and gain research interests in the continuous auditing, accounting information systems and recently development of CAATs. 3. To become aware of the relationship between accounting information systems and the other subsystems that comprise management information systems, and to understand the role of accountants as designers, users, and evaluators of information systems. To gain experience working successfully in group settings.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

description.en: This course will cover related study issues about clouding service. The research issues include three clouding service operation models (Saas, Paas, and Iaas), public clouding and private clouding, innovation service application, security management issues, the successful key factors of clouding service, and case study.

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.en: This course will focus on the intellectual property legal issues regarding innovation and entrepreneurship by drawing real cases for analysis and discussion. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

name.en: English Pragmatics in the Era of Globalization

description.zh: 在此全球化之際，一種文化所發出的訊息很可能得從另一種文化來解讀，其間需要對於情境、語境、社會文化背景的熟悉與高度認知，通過這種高度認知方能瞭解整體篇章的意義。由於英文是國際企業的通用語言，因此現今全世界的英文教育都在戮力納入全球組織語言的系統性探討。此課程目標在於討論英語語用學在傳播與企業等領域的可能應用，同時培養思辯能力。此課程可能包含的議題如下： 	道地英語/文對於英文學習在語言及文化上的挑戰 	英語媒體和企業語言中的隱約/間接/譬喻表達用法 	社會文化經驗與事件交互作用下的情境語感及意義變化 	英語社會中新型態媒體的實際與象徵層面 	資訊廣告類型如何合併資訊與說服以達意圖效果 	跨文化情境中語用模式的策略契合與積極修飾 	多國企業之多重語言/文化團隊所亟需之溝通技巧
description.en: In the wake of globalization, a message encoded in one culture may have to be decoded in the other, which entails the ability of making sense of a discourse through a strong awareness of language pragmatics in contextualization. English as the language for international communication has made English education worldwide strive to incorporate a systematic exploration of global organizational language. This course aims to address the potential applications of English pragmatics to fields such as media and business and simultaneously develop awareness for critical thinking, which may include the following topics:  	The linguistic and cultural challenges of naturally-occurring English to EFL comprehension; 	The covert/indirect/figurative use of expressions in English-language media and corporate discourses;  	The contextual senses and variations in meaning of a discourse based on the matrix of sociocultural experiences and occurrences; 	The pragmatic and symbolic dimensions in the

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程(實務研討)，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、創新性技術對傳統的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的專利地圖與迴避設計、科技知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study for graduate school  students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Innovative Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Patent Mapping and Design -Around of Research & Development, Knowledge management of Technology and Case Discussions, etc. In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

description.zh: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
description.en: This course is concerned with the theory and practice of hydrology, the science of water in subsurface environments which are helpful for groundwater resource exploitation and management. It is divided into two main parts: (1) basic concepts dealing with the origin, movement of groundwater, and its recovery from wells, and (2) a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the chemistry of natural and contaminated systems.

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 延續基礎水文學，使學生更深入了解水文工程上之問題及如何以不同之方法解決。本課程將包含線性與非線性系統之理論與應用、水文模式之發展及係數之率定等方法。
description.en: Presentation and evaluation of a variety of mathematical modeling techniques; presentation of theoretical basis of linear/nonlinear systems, advantages and limitations of various approaches, e.g., linear vs. nonlinear, lumped vs. distributed, used in hydrologic modeling; interrelation between function development and model calibration requirements.

description.zh: 水文遙測主要之目的為藉由衛星及飛機等的儀器收集地表對不同波長之反射特性，並加以分析，因此可用於國土監測及防災等。藉由波長反射的特性可率訂所需的參數，將可用於大尺度的模擬，如地表能量平衡、地表水文、土地利用、植物指標、地表溫度、輻射通量及地表土壤濕度等。
description.en: Observations by instruments on board satellites provide data on radiative characteristics of the earth's surface at various wavelengths.  From these characteristics, one may determine parameters of interest for large-scale modeling of the earth's energy balance and surface hydrology, for instance land use, vegetation indices, surface temperature, radiative fluxes, and surface soil moisture.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型理論與應用
name.en: Building Information Modeling: Theory and Applications

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而實際開發一個BIM相關資訊系統，其內容包括：建築資訊模型營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型實務應用，國內外建築資訊模型案例探討，建築資訊模型元件分析與設計，BIM程式撰寫，BIM系統之設計與實作等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for engineering and management applications, functions and decision-making. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, and development of BIM-related application in the lifecycle of construction projects. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments and a project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related application suitable to their own research or professional inteests.

description.zh: 本課程說明受壓構件之挫屈及挫屈後之線性及非線性行為及分析。整體挫屈及局部挫屈亦分別探討，圖使學生建立結構穩定之整體觀念。
description.en: To demonstrate the linear and nonlinear behaviore as well as analysis of buckling and postbuckling problems for pressed members. Both overall and local buckling are investigated.It is aimed to established an integrated idea for students at structural stability.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1)領導的基本概念；(2)中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3)領導的案例研究；(4)領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

name.en: Global Quality Management Practices and BigData Applications

description.zh: 本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。課程中以實務模式介紹為基礎，並配合個案分析以實例討論加強同學分析及解決實際問題的能力。課程第三階段將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間的關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用面有更深層的認識。
description.en: This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. The system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed. The curriculum of this class includes the introduction of empirical models integrated with case study so that the students will be strengthened in the capabilities of real world problem solving and quality improvement. Finally, the big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed. name.zh: 雲端應用與大數據實務
name.en: Cloud Computing Applications and Big Data Practices

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，顧客可隨時取用網路資源、軟體或資料之新模式。雲端運算不是一項全新技術，而是一項應用與服務創新的概念，「簡單的說，就是把所有的軟體或資料全部丟到網際網路上處理(Services on the Internet)」。雲端運算被視為新IT時代中最有影響力的整合技術之一，而大數據分析是它主要的應用，它亦是近年來資通訊(ICT)產業重要的趨勢與創新應用，是新一代的網際網路與資料中心(Data Center)。本課程主要內容包含雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算之服務與管理策略、以及雲端應用服務與個案實例。隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，已產生大量的數據，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與儲存大數據以及選擇有關大數據分析之應用服務與實例個案於課堂上簡報與研討。
description.en: Cloud computing is not a new technology, but the concept of application and service innovation. In short, cloud computing is regarded as one of the new IT era's most influential technology integration. Big data analysis is its main application. The key trends and innovative applications, as well as  the internet and a new generation of data centers (data center) will be discussed. The main contents of this course include the basic concepts of cloud computing, applications and case examples of cloud computing services and management strategy, big data applications etc.    With the widespread use of cloud computing services and the development of Internet services, huge amount of data has been generated. How to deal with the huge amount of data has become a hot research issue. This course will also include how to handle and store huge amount of data and how to carry out further exploration from big data. Big data case studies and practices will also be conducted in the class.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。

description.zh: 本課程介紹固體，尤其是半導體的光學性質，目的在了解光學檢測及光電元件的基礎原理。 藉由學習電磁波與半導體的交互作用，一方面可了解光在半導體中的產生、傳播、吸收、散射、及在界面的透射與反射等現象的規律，另一方面亦可認識光學特性與能帶結構、聲子結構、束縛與自由電子、及各種激發態之間的關係。課程內容包含固態物理複習、光學特性簡介、古典模型、帶間躍遷、激子、螢光現象、半導體低維系統的光學性質、自由載子及缺陷的光學性質、聲子相關特性、非線性光學性質等。
description.en: This course introduces the optical properties of solids, mainly semiconductors. The fundamental principles of absorption, reflection, luminescence and light scattering will be illustrated in terms of classical and quantum theories as appropriate. It mainly includes (1) Introduction (2) Classical propagation (3) Interband absorption (4) Excitons (5) Luminescence (6) Low-dimensional systems of semiconductors (7) Free electrons (8) Luminescence centers (9) Phonons (10)Nonlinear properties.

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 企業創新與研究是促成經營策略成功之不可或缺的部分。資通訊科技日新月益。現今資訊科技系統已成為企業中的重要部份。本課程的主要目標在廣泛的介紹使用更新進的資訊科技所促成的企業創新。
description.en: Business innovation and research are integral components of business strategy and success. The information & communication technologies (ICTs) advance rapidly. Now, the information technology system has become an essential part of enterprises. The goal of the course is breadth to cover advances in ICTs, with emphasis on enabling business innovation.

name.zh: 雲端運算之應用與服務
name.en: Applications and Services of Cloud Computing

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，因而顧客可隨時取用Web化的網路資源、軟體或資料。實際上，雲端運算 (Cloud Computing)是新一代的網際網路服務以及新一代的資料中心。本課程的主要內容包含網路基礎(含TCP/IP)、Client/Server和Intranet計算、雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算的核心技術、多人租用控制、雲端運算的服務模式、雲端運算應用架構、雲端運算的安全/私密/信任管理議題、雲端運算的發展策略以及結論。此外，本課程亦選擇一些有關雲端運算的期刊論文指定予同學研讀並於課堂上簡報和討論之。總之，本課程的教學目標是為了能讓同學完全瞭解最新的雲端運算之技術趨勢、應用發展以及服務管理。
description.en: Cloud Computing is a new model for enabling convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction. Practically, Cloud Computing is new frontier of Internet Computing and next generation Data Centers. This course covers Networking Fundamentals (including TCP/IP); Client/Server and Intranet Computing; Cloud Computing: An Overview; Core Technologies of Cloud Computing; Cloud Service Models; Multi-tenancy Control, Cloud Application Architecture: Hadoop: HDFS, Hbase, MapReduce; Security, Privacy and Trust Management Issues for Cloud Computing; Developing Strategies in Cloud Computing; and Conclusion. In summary, the teaching goal of this course is to provide students with the full understanding in technologies trend, applications development, and services management of Cloud Computing.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務管理的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的融資與投資決策制定。課程內容涵蓋：金融市場與金融機構、財務報表與現金流量分析、財務規劃與預測、風險與報酬、債券與股票之評價、資金成本、資本預算決策、資本結構與財務槓桿、營運資金管理、股利政策…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: The course focus on the three most important decisions of the financial management: the investment decisions, the financing decisions and short-term capital management and financial decisions of corporate managers, and various related topics with case studies. This course combines information and software tools to use; the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics including: Financial markets and financial institutions, the financial statements and cash flow analysis, financial planning and forecasting, risk and return, bond and stock pricing, the cost of capital, capital budgeting decisions, capital structure and financial leverage, working capital management, dividend policy, mergers and acquisitions, etc. This course combines b

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對水質化學之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。課程內容包括高等平衡化學、高等複合化學、高等氧化還原化學在於薄膜處理、離子交換、吸附處理及高級消毒處理程序之應用
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of water chemistry, water quality and water quality control.  The topic will include the applications of Chemical equilibrium, Redox reaction and coordination chemistry on water treatment processes such as CSF, membrane, GAC, Ion exchange and disinfection processes.

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

description.zh: 本課程重點包括MLA論文格式以及論文引用形式。本課程內容同時也協助學生準備碩士論文寫作，亦將使修課同學學習什麼是一個好的論文題目、如何開始探究議題、以及用清楚及正確的英文改進論文初稿。
description.en: This course covers basic MLA style and citation formats for research papers, and also helps students to prepare for writing their M.A. thesis by focusing on issues such as what makes for a good research question, how to begin researching a topic, and how to improve draft papers by using clear and correct English.

description.zh: 本課程目標在提供學生英漢與漢英口譯專業訓練。課程內容含括專業逐步與同步口譯技巧，以及口譯過程與訓練的學術理論。重點將置於重述、記憶訓練、數字與語法轉換、筆記與跟述練習，以累積逐步與同步口譯技巧。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with professional training in aspects of Chinese<->English interpreting. Course contents will cover both techniques in professional consecutive and simultaneous interpreting and academic research in the interpreting process and training. Emphasis will be placed on paraphrase, recall, numeric and syntactic conversion, note-taking and shadowing, which will lead to build-up skills in consecutive and simultaneous interpreting.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督/非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function多分類器, Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類, 分類正確率評估(Accuracy Assessments)及其他重要的應用，例如: 文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.en: This course provides students with material composition, physical and mechanical properties of concrete proportion and its modern development. Courses will also be included in the nonlinear analysis of concrete, creep, shrinkage and the failure theory and so  on.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 本課程乃專門為培育未來之企業領導人之精英人才而設計整學期之課程規劃。有鑑於加速之國際化與全球化之政經趨勢, 各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，牽涉到各種層面而常面臨"兩難" 甚至"三難"或"多難"之局面，如何能在面對這些多元多面暨看似衝突之企業目標與經濟決策，乃是當今高階管理之重要課題之一！有鑑於此,涵培育具有遠見與智慧見識之未來領袖，本課程為培育IMBA課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，除啟發各個學生之領導特質與才華，亦將建立其面對多元企業決策時之判斷力、價值觀、 對企業與社會之認知與準則，透過各種專業管理個案之研討與實戰模擬，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與再造，企業倫理各方面相關之管理議題與能力之建構。
description.en: In the era of technological & social growth at an exponential speed, more than ever, business leaders across the globe are facing even more challenging issues, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects.  In this elite IMBA program of NTUT, this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains.  How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the students’ talent within as in all the other executive management programs. description.zh: 本課程將介紹模糊邏輯、模糊推論、模糊控制及其應用。滑動模式控制、適應性控制、最佳控制、基因演算法及其相關智慧型控制方法之設計及應用也將在此課程中被探討。此外，藉由一些物理及工程的系統以驗證課程中所介紹之智慧型控制法方之可行性及有效性。
description.en: In this course, fuzzy logic, fuzzy inference, fuzzy control and its application will be introduced. In addition, sliding mode control, adaptive control, genetic algorithm and optimal control will also be explored in this course. Moreover, some engineering and physical models are used to show the feasibility and validity of these intelligent control methods.

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 車輛產業是一個不允許失效發生的產業，為了防止系統失效的發生，必須有一套嚴謹且可靠的開發流程來讓開發工程師依循。如何提供一套功能安全設計流程來讓開發工程師依循，且對於分析結果有嚴謹的確認制度是相關產業未來生存與發展之非常重要的工作，因此車輛安全技術國際標準(ISO 26262) 將成為車輛產業系統功能安全設計分析手法的主流。
description.en: The occurrence of system failure is not allowed in vehicle industry. In order to prevent it, developers must have rigorous and reliable development processes. How to provide a set of functional safety design processes to help developers to follow and a strict accreditation criterion to ensure that analysis results are consistent with requirements are very important for the related industries to survive and develop.  Consequently, ISO 26262, the international standard of road vehicles functional safety will become the main analysis techniques of a system function safety design for vehicle industry in future.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

notes: 創新所與創新所在職專班合開/設計603

description.zh: 經由對環境問題的一般瞭解，研究現有之綠色設計政策、綠色設計管理及綠色生命週期設計。分析研究可行的方案來落實reduce, reuse 及 recycle （3R）三原則於產品設計程序之中。
description.en: A general review of environment issues and their problems followed by studies on green design policy, green design management, life-cycle design. Studies of exploring guidelines that lead to implementation of principles of reduce, reuse and recycle in process of product design.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。

Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

notes: 創新所與創新所在職專班合開

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(三)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(III)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 創新所與創新所在職專班合開/設計603

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(三)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(III)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 產品服務系統設計專案研究

description.zh: 產品服務系統設計專案研究包含研究與設計。本課程強調具知識內涵的設計過程，以知識的探討與研究為手段，豐富設計創意的發展。透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。本課程藉由設計主題或產學合作進行實際演練，應用新科技與新材料的發展，並探討生活型態與市場的需求，研發創新型態的產品服務系統。其中應用的方法包括：問題分析，需求研究，方案評估，設計檢核，價值呈現及績效評價。
description.en: Product Service System Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems – innovatively. ‘Innovation’ is the ultimate stage for learning, critical thinking and combining all acquired knowledge to produce something new and unique. This course provides an approach to Knowledge Embedded Design. In order to identify, expand and test user’s requirement, research and design process will be carried out under the instruction, which includes Identify the Problem, Investigation Research, Identify Possible Solution, Choose Best Solution & Develop Detail, Implement Solution, and finally, Test & Evaluation.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

notes: 電機系碩士班、電資外生專班、自動化所合開

description.zh: 1.數位科技時代在摩爾定律的預估下，地球上人類生活經濟的變化，已非從工業經濟時代的經營觀念與法則所能因應。2.創新設計已成為了企業因變應變的主要法則，美國設計管理協會副主席GE公司業務副總裁Beth Comstock於2011國際美國設計管理協會年會 (DMI)中曾提出，「在21世紀企業經營重點在創新設計，創新設計的重點是如何有效應用於企業經營」。美國商業週刊2005/7月封面故事標題是「明日的商學院可能被設計學院取代」美國哈佛大學管理論壇專文曾提出未來企業經營主管將不只要在經管團隊中聘請設計師，而本身應該成為一個設計師。3.本課程是今日數位科技時代，企業應用創新設計思維進行創新的核心課程，並以3M前新產品開發主管Gerard H. Gaynor 「Innovation by Design」及Roger Martin的「The Design of Business」為參考課本輔以美國設計管理協會出版(DMI)的國際創新設計成功範例教學。本課程將以理論，實例與實務工作營方式進行。
description.en: As the forecasting of Moor's law, In today's rapid progressing technology and economic Era, The traditional rule of business management and product development, will no longer be effective."What business needs now is design, What design needs now, is making it about business"  Beth Comstock. SVP. GE. and Co-Chair. DMI. Conference 2011.The Vice Chair of American Design Management Institute. notes: 四設三、四設四、創新所與創新所在職專班合開

description.zh: 本課程將從石油談起，介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，並將介紹供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之各種烯烴與芳香烴工業。隨著環保意識高漲，石油工業發展面臨，工安、環保、節能減碳、水資源、化石能源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰以及面對產業轉型之石化高值化，也是本課程之目標。
description.en: Topics covered: 1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture.2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemical manufacture 3. Petrochemicals and its application4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 5. Industrial safety, environmental concern, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry

name.zh: 電腦整合實體模型設計

description.zh: 1.實體模型設計簡介與應用2.實體模型設計軟體功能與使用者介面之簡介(簡介構成軟體的各項模組)3.建構繪圖環境(訂置繪圖工具列與草圖顯示內容)4.建構參考幾何(繪製草圖，尺寸標註、產生基準面、曲線、曲面等)5.使用特徵(填料、除料、伸長、掃出、旋轉…等的使用)6.組件的繪製(特徵編輯，處理組件的組態…)7.組合件的處理(處理方式、產生組合件、爆炸圖、模型組態、於零組件中註記)8.鈑金零件9.熔接10.工程圖的處理(訂製工程圖範本、產生工程圖、組件與組合件的視圖)11.模型外觀的處理(材質、顏色、光源)12.輸出與輸入檔案的處理
description.en: 1.	Introduction and Applications of solid modeling2.Introduction of functions and user interface of software for solid modeling3.Create working environoment4.Reference geometry5.Using features6.Working with parts7.Working with assemblies8.Sheet metal9.Weldments10.Create engineering drawing11.Out-looking treatment (materials, color, light source,…)12.Importing and Exporting files

notes: 自動化所與機電所合開

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一.健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二.建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三.生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四.診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

notes: 與建都所、設計博班合併開課

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

name.zh: 創新創業智財法律專題研究
name.en: Innovation, Entrepreneurship and Intellectual Property Law

description.zh: 本課程呼應技職再造的創新創業趨勢，以具體個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對如何透過智財法律推動知識經濟、創新創業有興趣的同學。同學可以透過本課程，進一步了解創新創業現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。
description.en: This course will focus on the intellectual property legal issues regarding innovation and entrepreneurship by drawing real cases for analysis and discussion. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(III)

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 本課程以講授高等精密量測之原理與技術為主，課程包括下列主題：精密量測概論，幾何誤差分析，系統誤差分析，機器體積誤差計算及自動化補償技術，表面粗糙度之精密量測與分析，智慧型量測系統設計，奈米量測，微光機電量測及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced principles and techniques used in Precision Metrology (PM). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction, geometric errors analysis, system errors analysis, machine volumetric errors and automatic compensation, surface roughness measurement and analysis, design of intelligent measurement systems, and conclusion.

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 目前全世界超過一半以上的人口生活在城市，人數仍快速增加中，相伴而來的環境、經濟、社會與治理問題將如何處理？因此城市轉型是城市要繼續成長的必要過程，許多案例顯示創意城市是城市轉型的典範，可以作為城市轉型與再生的契機。創意城市是近年來先進國家鼓勵領導者、產業、市民從己身城市內思考、規劃、發揮創意與實現城市創新的觀念，以啟發城市找到自身的發展潛能，結合當地文化資產及地方特色，經由城市發展規劃提升創意經濟及城市的競爭力。本課程以文化創意、產業創新及城市規劃為主軸，包括研究創意城市定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎，進而探討與文化創意、產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外城市的創新與再生案例，他們是如何在城市議題上思考、規劃與執行富有創意的行動，又如何將行動運用於城市規劃。課程經由互動分析創意城市與城市規劃的關連及作法，討論可供借鏡的發展策略與方案。
description.en: The creative city is crucial to urban transformation in the future of our city. It means to encourage leaders,industries, and citizens to think, plan, create and realize urban innovation, inspired by the city to find their own development potential, combined with local cultural assets and characteristics, to enhance the creative economy through urban development planning and the city's competitiveness. The course aims at framing cultural creativity, industrial innovation and urban planning as main thoughts on the basis of research. Literature review including definition, characteristics, conditions, indicators, types of assessment, and then to explore with the cases of innovation and regeneration around the world. How they think urban issues, planning and implementation on creative actions, and how the actions used in urban planning.Courses via interactive analysis among the creative city,urban planning and practices,to figure out development strategies and programs available to learn.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

notes: IMBA與資財所合開,英語授課,12:10-15:00 pm 40人上限

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.zh: 動畫電影中的中世紀文化
name.en: Knights, Monsters, Castles and Other Things Medieval in Hollywood Movies and Japanese Anime

description.zh: 廣義上，中世紀時期可被定義為由羅馬帝國的衰落開始並持續至十五世紀文藝復興。中古世紀被文藝復興時期的人們視為一段缺乏啟蒙、知識及現代化的黑暗時期。然而許多黑暗時期的故事--如亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主—卻一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: The Medieval Period can be defined broadly as that period from the fall of the Roman Empire to the 15th century Italian Renaissance – a dark time, if one is to believe the men of the Renaissance, in need of light, knowledge, modernization. Yet the stories of these dark ages – of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹各種光學方法，用以量測位移及角度之變化，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號，以便進行分析。其內容含 :            ．簡介                ．雙頻干涉儀        ．幾何誤差            ．光學尺        ．幾何光學法          ．雷射光學尺        ．干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target . Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves :               ．Introduction            ．Optical Heterodyne Interfeometer        ．Geometrical Error       ．Optical Encoder         ．Geometrical  Methods   ．Laser Encoder        ．Interferometers

description.zh: 本課程主要是教導學生在熱流學領域上的基本知識，課程內容主要包括: 1. 熱力特性簡介， 2. 熱力學基本定律， 3. 基本冷凍空調循環， 4. 流體特性簡介， 5. 柏努利方程式， 6. 管內與管外流， 7. 穩態與暫態熱傳分析， 8. 散熱片之熱傳分析， 9. 強制對流分析， 10. 自然對流分析， 11. 具相變化的熱對流: 凝結與沸騰。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic knowledge of thermo-fluid sciences. The main content includes: 1. Introduction to thermodynamic properties, 2. Basic laws of thermodynamics, 3. Fundamentals of Refrigerating and air-conditioning cycles, 4. Introduction of fluid properties, 5. Bernoulli equation, 6. Internal and external flows, 7. Steady and transient heat conduction analysis, 8. Heat transfer from extended surfaces, 9. Forced convection, 10. Natural convection, 11. Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.
